DOC.brief_summary: This study recruit 50 healthy woman normal menstrual cycle age 40-50 , investigate expression NEI network urine metabolomics .
DOC.brief_title: Qing ' E Formula Therapy Menopausal Symptoms ( Healthy Volunteers Recruitment Control Study )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy woman normal menstrual cycle age 4050 . 2 . The score Kupperman index less 15 . 3 . Not alcoholics smoker ( past smoking ) . 4 . Get subject informed consent process comply GCP requirement . 1 . Volunteers heart , liver , kidney disease acute chronic gastrointestinal disease , disease blood , endocrine , neurological system . 2 . Volunteers participate clinical trial within 3 month . 3 . Volunteers donate blood loose blood heavily within 3 month . 4 . Volunteers previous history mental illness , drug abuse drug dependence . 5 . Volunteers take drug within 14 day trail .
